text: Aleksandr Vyacheslavovich Stepanov (; born 5 June 1996) is a Russian football player who plays for Lori FC. ==Club career== Stepanov made his debut in the Russian Professional Football League for FC Dynamo-2 Moscow on 20 July 2016 in a game against FC Tekstilshchik Ivanovo. Stepanov made his Russian Football National League debut for FC Volgar Astrakhan on 15 July 2017 in a game against FC Rotor Volgograd. On 30 August 2020, Lori FC announced the signing of Stepanov to a one-year contract with the option of another. ==References== ==External links== * Profile by Russian Professional Football League Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Dynamo Moscow reserves players Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:FC Volgar Astrakhan players
title: Aleksandr Stepanov (footballer, born 1996)
